Title: Avatar
Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Title: Star War the Third Gathers: The Backstroke of the West
Plot: Mistranslated fandub of Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (2005).

Title: Your Name
Plot: Ibe Riki and Riko Takeo are preparing for a wedding ceremony.

Title: Titanic
Plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: The Good Student
Plot: An unpopular high school teacher turns his life around after a student is kidnapped.

Title: The Jungle King
Plot: A reluctant lion king has his paws full trying to save his jungle kingdom.

Title: Silent Night
Plot: A grieving father enacts his long-awaited revenge against a ruthless gang on Christmas Eve.

Title: Spider-Man
Plot: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

Title: Thor
Plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Title: 10 Minutes Gone
Plot: A crime thriller that centers on a man whose memory has been lost due to a bank heist gone wrong. The character will need to piece together the missing 10 minutes from his memory in order to determine who sabotaged him.

Title: 6 Days
Plot: Armed gunmen stormed the Iranian Embassy in London in April 1980, taking hostages. A tense six-day standoff ensued as the SAS, a highly trained military unit, prepared for an unprecedented raid to resolve the crisis.

Title: Young Detective Dee: Rise of the Sea Dragon
Plot: From legendary action director Tsui Hark and the creators of international smash hit Detective Dee - Mystery Of The Phantom Flame comes the captivating tale of Dee Renjie's beginnings in the Imperial police force. His very first c...

Title: Battlefield: Fall of the World
Plot: Earth has completely succumbed to an alien invasion, and the planet has become a hell. To stop the monsters, troops formed by different countries have disregarded their personal safety to defend what is left.

Title: Killer Mountain
Plot: A group of mountain climbers disappears while climbing the Himalayas in the 1950s. In the present, another group takes the same route and also disappears. A shady rich man hires a professional mountaineer and some scientists to fi...

Title: Pee Nak
Plot: Three men on their way to monk-hood, don't realize the temple at which they will receive their ordination is cursed by the wrath of Pee Nak, a mythical giant snake.

Title: Pee Nak 2
Plot: Though they've fulfilled their pledges, First and Balloon secretly leave monkhood so they can live secular lives but a new ghost starts haunting them.

Title: Pee Nak 3
Plot: A group of friends have to break a curse from an ancient spirit and have a friend ordained as a monk.

Title: Pee Nak 4
Plot: Three friends find themselves at an old temple located on the outskirts of the city. However, this temple harbours a terrifying legend: anyone who wishes to be ordained as a monk there is cursed.

Title: Arthur Christmas
Plot: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a misplaced present to a young girl in less than two hours on Christmas Day.

Title: Paddington
Plot: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.

Title: Bridge to Terabithia
Plot: Leslie and Jess create the secret kingdom of Terabithia, a land of monsters, trolls, ogres and giants where they spend their free time ruling as king and queen and fighting evil creatures.

Title: Ballerina
Plot: Grieving the loss of a best friend she couldn't protect, an ex-bodyguard sets out to fulfill her dear friend's last wish: sweet revenge.

Title: The Mechanic
Plot: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

Title: Candle in the Tomb: The Worm Valley
Plot: The team of Hu Bayi, Shirley Yang and Wang Kaixuan goes to the Worm Valley in Yun Nan, to search the legendary Mu Chen Gem.

Title: Candle in the Tomb
Plot: Shirley Yang is an archaeologist who grew up in the United States. When she learns that her father has disappeared while exploring graves, she returns to China to try to find him.

Title: The World Unseen
Plot: A drama centered on two women who engage in a dangerous relationship during South Africa's apartheid era.

Title: Pandora
Plot: The explosion of a nuclear power plant caused by an earthquake leads to a disaster which no one other than its workers can stop from spreading further.

Title: Cosmic Sin
Plot: Seven rogue soldiers launch a preemptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilization in the hopes of ending an interstellar war before it starts.

Title: Mohawk
Plot: Late in the War of 1812, a young Mohawk woman and her two lovers battle a squad of American soldiers hell-bent on revenge.

Title: Gattaca
Plot: Vincent, an "In-Valid", assumes the identity of a member of the genetic elite to pursue his goal of traveling into space with the Gattaca Aerospace Corporation. However, a week before his mission, a murder marks Vincent as a suspect.

Title: Chappie
Plot: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

Title: Jurassic Triangle
Plot: A group of colleagues crash land on a mysterious island that they cannot escape. They discover they are not alone when they encounter an array of blood thirsty creatures and dinosaurs out to get them. Will they survive the island?

Title: Jailbreak
Plot: What started as a simple escort mission will soon turn to chaos as the prisoners of Koh Kla take over the prison grounds. A special task force [Jean-Paul Ly, Dara Our, Tharoth Sam] gets trapped in the prison will have to fight the...

Title: Jabberwock
Plot: A brave knight returns to his homeland to find a powerful dragon terrorizing his village. After many unsuccessful attempts to defeat the monster, he makes a sword which has magical powers that should do the trick.

Title: Almighty Zeus
Plot: When an old Asian man is attacked and sprayed with hand sanitizer, a young boxer goes viral for knocking out the aggressor.

Title: Peace River
Plot: A Champion Rodeo cowboy and special forces soldier is crushed by war and personal loss and must draw on faith and the "cowboy way" to reclaim his will to live and the love of his life.

Title: Convict
Plot: Sent to prison because of manslaughter, Ray is challenged both physically and mentally by a sadistic prison boss.

Title: Yellow Flowers on the Green Grass
Plot: Set in the countryside village of Vietnam, Yellow Flowers on the Green grass is a touching tale of innocent love, friendships and brotherhood.

Title: Just Another Dream
Plot: When a fateful injury sparks an ordinary girl to have foretelling dreams, she is forced into a race against time to save her family and prove her sanity....or is it JUST ANOTHER DREAM? Action/Drama.
